meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sonrisa Cooper Nishant Menon Laura Amundson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6640.

td.p: Sonrisa Cooper, a project assistant from Jamaica Plain, Massachusetts
Nishant Menon, an economist from Hyattsville, Maryland
Laura Amundson, a former criminal defense attorney from Des Moines, Iowa (whose 1-day cash winnings total $20,395)

tr.td: THE ENVIRONMENT
ROCK GROUP NAMES
POTPOURRI
AN OGDEN NASH MENAGERIE
HELLO!
GOOD "BI"

Laura
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Sonrisa] Looks like you were going for something. On the... Waterfront?)
(Sonrisa: On the Road.)
(Alex: On the Road. Well, you didn\'t complete it, and that\'ll cost you, unfortunately.)
...
(Alex: [To Nishant] No, that was another author\'s work.)
SonrisaWhat is on the
$2,800
NishantWhat is Rabbit At Rest?
$14,399
LauraWhat is Rabbit Run?
$11,000
On the Road')

Nishant

Sonrisa

(including 1 DD),

(including 2 DDs)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
